trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AudioLevelUpdated" name="AudioLevelUpdated" href=""></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref uid="langword_csharp_AudioLevelUpdated" name="AudioLevelUpdated" href=""></xref>事件<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref>或<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When they are raised, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> events pass an instance of AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs to the handler for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: 當這些事件引發時，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>事件可傳遞至相關聯的事件處理常式 AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs 的執行個體。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> property gets the new level of audio input when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>屬性會取得新的層級的音訊輸入時<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `AudioLevel` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes provides the current level of the audio input to the speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: `AudioLevel`屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>類別提供語音辨識引擎的音訊輸入的目前層級。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the new level of audio input after the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated"></xref> or the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 取得新的層級的音訊輸入之後<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated"></xref>或<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated"></xref>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The new level of audio input.
